title: What Should Our Listener Do To Get Rid Of Her Ex?
description:
Our listener's ex can't take the hint...their relationship is over! He still attempts to reach out via text, and social media. And it doesn't end there! He even shows up to her job. 
What can she do to put an end to this creepiness? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
